devdoc.details: Smart contract to link Ethereum addresses with Nostr public keys

getEventHash(bytes32,uint256,uint256,str.details: Utility function for testing - compute event hash

pullLinkr().details: Remove the linkage between caller's address and their Nostr pubkey

pushLinkr(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint25.details: Main function to link Ethereum address to Nostr pubkey

params.content: The content of the event (must be sender's address without 0x prefix)
params.createdAt: Unix timestamp when the event was created
params.id: The Nostr event ID (hash of the event)
params.kind: The Nostr event kind (must be 27235 for linkage)
params.pubkey: The Nostr public key to link with
params.sig: The Schnorr signature of the Nostr event (64 bytes)
params.tags: JSON string of event tags (must be empty array "[]")

verifyNostrEvent(bytes32,bytes32,uint256.details: Verify Nostr event according to NIP-01 specification

params.pubkey: The public key that signed the event

returns._0: bool True if the event is valid, false otherwise

devdoc.title: NostrLinkr

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to create verifiable links between their Ethereum address and Nostr identity
